CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(EBH_AvisCreationDateFirst__c), NULL,
IF( ISNULL(EBH_SoldItemDateFirst__c), TODAY() - EBH_AvisCreationDateFirst__c,
EBH_SoldItemDateFirst__c - EBH_AvisCreationDateFirst__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: # Days that seller spent in the Activation stage (from the date when EBFSKU Prefix was created to the date when a seller sold first fulfillment item)
CustomField.label: Days in Activation
